attributes.description:
This is possibly the neatest and most well taken care of SLK 350 in its category available in South Africa. The vehicle has been modernized through the installation of a purpose fitted touch screen system. 
What we have done:
Valet, polish and headlight polish.
Extras include:
AMG Kit
Removed cats to improve airflow and fuel efficiency 
AMG rims
Recent full service including plugs and brakes 
Media system with car play, nav, Bluetooth, front and rear camera 
Very native and integrated media system - steering buttons all work seamlessly
